text:
In honor of 2 legendary sportswriters, Mr. Roger B. Brown and Mr. Martin McNeal....Mark Cuban donates $100,000 to @NABJ @NABJSports Covid-19 relief fund to help black journalists impacted by job cuts  #NBA #Sportsbiz #Mavericks 
https://t.co/GXvp6nHPGD
